name: Safari Hue 8 Wheels 55 Cms Small Cabin Trolley Bag
description: Stylish and compact, the Safari Hue features 8-wheel agility and a durable lightweight shell, making it the perfect cabin companion for short trips and weekend getaways.

name: Aristocrat Comet Cabin Trolley Bag
description: A reliable and budget-friendly cabin bag with a sleek design. The Aristocrat Comet offers ample storage space and smooth-rolling wheels for easy maneuverability.

name: Mokobara The Transit Cabin Luggage
description: Modern aesthetics meet functional design. The Mokobara Transit features a premium hardshell, whisper-quiet wheels, and a built-in USB port for charging on the move.

name: Safari Accent 8 Wheel Hard Cabin Trolley Suitcase
description: Bold colors and tough build define the Safari Accent. With its 8-wheel system and reinforced corners, it's designed to withstand the rigors of frequent travel.

name: Nasher Miles Vienna Hard-Sided Cabin Luggage Trolley Bag
description: Inspired by European elegance, the Nasher Miles Vienna combines sophisticated style with light-weight performance and top-tier security features.

name: Skybags Stroke Medium Hard Luggage Trolley
description: A medium-sized powerhouse with a unique 'stroke' design. Perfect for week-long trips, offering expanded capacity and a scratch-resistant finish.

name: Skybags Skylite Hard Sided Large Trolley Bag
description: Maximize your packing with the Skylite Large. Despite its size, it remains remarkably light, featuring 360-degree rotation and advanced TSA-approved locks.

name: Skybags FLOAT Hard Trolley Luggage
description: Engineered for effortless travel, the Skybags FLOAT glides like it's in the air. Its ultra-modern design is paired with high-impact resistance for peace of mind.

name: Skybags Float Check-in Trolley Hard Luggage
description: The check-in version of the FLOAT series, offering the same sleek aesthetics and effortless glide in a size suited for longer international adventures.

name: Skybags Cityscape
description: Designed for the urban explorer. The Cityscape range blends professional looks with travel-ready utility, featuring smart internal organization.

name: Skybags Oscar Spinner Hard Trolley
description: Standing out with its vibrant design, the Oscar Spinner is as tough as it is stylish. Features an ergonomic grip handle and smooth dual-wheels.

name: Skybags Cityscape Cabin Trolley Suitcase
description: The cabin-sized variant of the Cityscape, perfect for short business trips where style and efficiency are paramount.

name: HRX Grit Laptop Cabin Suitcase
description: Built for the active professional, this HRX suitcase features a dedicated front laptop compartment for quick security access and a rugged, sporty finish.

name: Aristocrat Small Cabin Suitcase
description: Minimalist and highly functional, this small cabin bag is designed for maximum overhead bin compatibility without sacrificing internal space.

name: HRX Medium Check-in Suitcase
description: Combining sports-inspired durability with spacious design, the HRX Medium Check-in is perfect for the adventurous traveler who needs extra room and reliability.

name: MOVE-MEANT Large Check-in Suitcase (75 cm)
description: A massive suitcase for extensive travel. The MOVE-MEANT series focuses on volume and strength, ensuring your belongings stay safe even on long-haul flights.

name: HRX Hard Body Set of 2 Luggage
description: Double the value with two premium hard-bodied suitcases. This set includes a cabin and a medium check-in bag, perfect for all your travel needs.

name: Safari Foxe Hard Body Set of 2
description: A matching set of two Safari Foxe suitcases. Known for their iconic textured shell and extreme durability, this set covers both short and long trips.

name: Aristocrat Large Check-in Suitcase (76 cm)
description: Get maximum storage at a great price. Aristocrat's large check-in suitcase is lightweight yet sturdy, featuring a classic design that never goes out of style.

name: YAYAVAR Medium Check-in Suitcase
description: A versatile medium-sized bag with a focus on ease of movement and modern aesthetics. YAYAVAR combines style with practical travel features.

name: Aristocrat Hard Body Set of 2
description: Upgrade your travel gear with this set of two Aristocrat hard-bodied suitcases. Durable, smooth-rolling, and perfectly sized for any journey.

name: ALFA by VIP Small Cabin
description: The perfect entry-level cabin bag from the trusted House of VIP. Simple, effective, and built to meet all standard airline requirements.

name: HRX Hard Body Set of 3
description: The ultimate travel solution. A complete 3-piece set from HRX featuring small, medium, and large suitcases to handle any itinerary imaginable.

name: Safari Magnum Zeno Set of 3
description: A premium 3-piece set from the Magnum Zeno range. Features top-tier build quality, extra security, and a professional look for the whole family.

name: Safari Eclipse Neo 66 Check-in
description: Modern and edgy, the Eclipse Neo 66 offers a unique shell texture that resists scratches. A solid choice for medium-duration trips.

name: Safari Eclipse Neo 55 Cabin
description: The cabin version of the Eclipse Neo. Features the same scratch-resistant tech in a size that fits comfortably in overhead lockers.

name: Kamiliant Small Cabin
description: Stand out with Kamiliant's vibrant colors and unique textures. Durable, lightweight, and funâ€”perfect for the young-at-heart traveler.

name: Kamiliant Combination Lock Cabin
description: Focusing on security, this Kamiliant cabin bag features an integrated combination lock while maintaining the brand's signature bold style.

name: Roamx Metrolite Check-in Suitcase
description: Ultra-lightweight and metropolitan in design. The Roamx Metrolite is built for speed and efficiency during check-in and transit.

name: Killer Hard Sided Spinner Expandable Cabin
description: An expandable cabin bag that doesn't compromise on strength. Features a hard-sided shell with spinner wheels for ultimate versatility.
